definition: storytelling dramatic art dating back to Song and Yuan periods, single narrator without music, often historical topics with commentary
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: The history of the evolution of Yangzhou Pinghua's accents records both positive and negative experience.
sentences.chinese: 揚州評話語音演變的歷史飽含正反兩面經驗。

sentences.english: The historical glory of Yangzhou Pinghua (popular tales in Yangzhou) is in sharp contrast with its current decline in popularity.
sentences.chinese: 揚州評話歷史的輝煌和目前的衰落形成巨大反差。
